title: The Observer Squad
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>I wonder if Ruby-chan is alright? See, Rin-chan is like a puppy, she loves to hop around all over the place….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Wouldn’t Rin-san get mad if you say that she’s like a puppy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s fine, it’s fine. In fact, she’ll probably be happy. “Puppies are cute nya~” or something like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, fufufu. But, I guess I can kind of see it…. Ah, Rin-chan looks like she’s about to fall!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Aaah…. Or not, she’s okay. Ruby-chan helped her huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Nice one, Ruby….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ruby-chan is reliable, isn’t she. Even though she seems to get pulled around by Rin-chan, whenever Rin-chan is in danger she always helps. Is this another result of your upbringing, oh big sister?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I wouldn’t call my upbringing…. Ruby is already a dependable adult<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>An adult huh, you look a little lonely saying that, Dia-san~. I’ll give you some headpats<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kyaah! N-, Nozomi-san, geez….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
